resources.string: With the help of allies Lt. Jim Gordon and DA Harvey Dent, Batman has been able to keep a tight lid on crime in Gotham City. But when a vile young criminal calling himself the Joker (Heath Ledger) suddenly throws the town into chaos, the caped Crusader begins to tread a fine line between heroism and vigilantism.

Its the summer of 1983, and precocious 17-year-old Elio Perlman is spending the days with his family at their 17th-century villa in Lombardy, Italy. He soon meets Oliver. Elio and Oliver discover the heady beauty of awakening desire over the course of a summer that will alter their lives forever.
Andrew Neiman is an ambitious young jazz drummer, in pursuit of rising to the top of his elite music conservatory.

Dom Cobb is a thief with the rare ability to enter peoples dreams and steal their secrets from their subconscious. His skill has made him a hot commodity in the world of corporate espionage but has also cost him everything he loves.
